name: Deeper in the Woods (Nat1Wizard)
description:
Play as Summer Blackburn as you attempt to collect enough energy crystals to repair your crashed spaceship.

A short game made for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam. Designed to be played with a gamepad, but works with keyboard and mouse.

Note: The WebGL currently has revered controls when using gamepad. Please download the build or switch to keyboard input instead.
